de.amr.plt.rcTestapp

Class MapView.MapThread

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • de.amr.plt.rcTestapp.MapView.MapThread
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable
    Enclosing class:
    MapView

    static class MapView.MapThread
extends java.lang.Thread
    Thread of class MapView. Handles all drawing functionality.
    Version:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Daniel Wohllebe

      • setSensorValues

        public void setSensorValues(double front,
                   double frontside,
                   double back,
                   double backside)
        Sets the sensor values, which are then drawn in doDraw(). Sensor values are required in mm and are converted to cm (because the Perception module is returning the wrong values)
        Parameters:
        front -
        frontside -
        back -
        backside -

      • convertToCartesianX

        private double convertToCartesianX(double r,
                         double phi)
        Converts polar coordinates to Cartesian x value. The angle will be reserved to account for difference between coordinates systems from NXT Robot to Tablet.
        Parameters:
        radius - r
        angle - phi
        Returns:
        x value

      • convertToCartesianY

        private double convertToCartesianY(double r,
                         double phi)
        Converts polar coordinates to Cartesian y value. The angle will be reserved to account for difference between coordinates systems from NXT Robot to Tablet.
        Parameters:
        radius - r
        angle - phi
        Returns:
        y value
